'''Minecraft Live 2022 Sample Pack''' is an official [[add-on]] developed to demonstrate the capabilities of the Minecraft Entity Wizard,<ref>{{Mcnet|introduction-minecraft-entity-wizard-blockbench|Introduction to Minecraft Entity Wizard in Blockbench|September 10, 2021|[[Mike Stagnitta]]}}</ref> a feature in [[Blockbench]].

== Additions ==

=== Entities ===
{{redirect|Racoon|the pet in {{MCD}}|Dungeons:Racoon}}
{{redirect|Wraith|the mob in {{MCD}}|Dungeons:Wraith}}
{{for|other uses of "butterfly"|Butterfly}}{{for|other uses of "ghost"|Ghost}}
* [[File:Minecon Biceson.png|32px]] Biceson
** Developed by Benton Brost and Connor @ Minecraft.
** Described as a relative of the American Bison.
** Uses the [[Polar Bear|polar bear]] AI as a basis, with the added ability to charge, throw [[Snowball|snowballs]] and icicles, and use [[Frost Walker|frost walker]].
* [[File:Minecon Black Bear.png|32px]] Black Bear
** Developed by Beth B. and a full class.
** Based off of the mascot for Austin High School.
* [[File:Phantom BE1.gif|32px]] Boomfly
** Developed by Jackson F.
** A "fun take" on [[Phantom|phantoms]], with the ability to [[Explosion|explode]], likened to [[Warden|wardens]] in terms of threat.
* [[File:Minecon Booshroom.png|32px]] Booshroom
** Developed by Chloe @ Minecraft
** Appears during night, similar to phantoms
** Drop [[Bed|beds]] when killed instead of [[Phantom Membrane|phantom membrane]]
* [[File:Minecon Butterfly.gif|32px]] Butterfly
** Developed by Olivia.
** Shares AI with [[bees]].
* [[File:Minecon Eyeder.png|32px]] Eyeder
** Developed by Rob @ Minecraft.
* [[File:Cow.png|32px]] Flying Cow
** Developed by Trip B.
* [[File:Minecon Frost Moose.png|32px]] Frost Moose
** Developed by Kayla @ Minecraft.
** Described as a "mystic animal at home in the snow."
* [[File:Minecon Ghost.png|32px]] Ghost
** Developed by Isah.
** Flies around the world like a [[vex]].
* [[File:Minecon Hornbill.png|32px]] Hornbill
** Developed by Stephen @ Minecraft.
** Distinctly not a toucan.
* [[File:Minecon Lilydog.png|32px]] Lilydog
** Developed by Reagan A.
** Made in the image of the developer's own dog, Lily.
** Created to add wolf variety, later fulfilled in [[Armored Paws]].
* [[File:Minecon Smick Mimic.png|32px]] Mimic
** Developed by Jaylon B.
** Referred to as the "Smick Mimic" by its creator, being a [[shulker]] that adapted to copy [[Chest|chests]].
* [[File:Minecon Nardolphle.gif|32px]] Nardolphle
** Developed by Anjelika @ Minecraft.
** Uses the [[dolphin]] model but [[turtle]] AI.
* [[File:Minecon Narwhal.gif|32px]] Narwhal
** Developed by Bo P.
** Created to raise awareness for real narwhals.
* {{animate|Minecon Green Pearrot.png;Minecon Orange Pearrot.png;Minecon Pink Pearrot.png;Minecon Yellow Pearrot.png;Minecon Yellow2 Pearrot.png|32px}}Pearrot
** Developed by Rob @ Minecraft.
** Can be tamed with [[Apple|apples]].
** Come in five different colors: green, orange, pink, and two shades of yellow.
* [[File:Minecon Phoenix.gif|32px]] Phoenix
** Developed by Blake G.
** An "attack pet" that cannot die, turning into a baby upon being killed.
** Functions similarly to a [[Totem of Undying|totem of undying]] when tamed.
* [[File:Minecon Racoon.png|32px]] Racoon
** Developed by Dylan C.
** Spawns in any [[forest]] biome and sometimes [[plains]].
** Designed to be ambience, the creator likening them to a "source of entertainment" for the player.
** Can climb [[trees]].
* [[File:Minecon Robot.png|32px]] Robot
** Developed by Sebastian S.
** A "synthetic mob," designed to be challenging.{{Needs testing}}
* [[File:Minecon Sea Chicken.png|32px]] Sea Chicken
** Developed by Chloe @ Minecraft.
** Made using [[salmon]] as a base, even still dropping [[Salmon (item)|salmon]]. The creator was noted as finding this humorous.
* [[File:Minecon Sheepomelon.png|32px]] Sheepomelon
** Developed by Rob @ Minecraft.
** Drop [[Melon Slice|melon slices]] when [[Shears|sheared]].
* [[File:Minecon Snow Wizard.png|16px]] Snow Wizard
** Developed by Chloe @ Minecraft.
** Made using AI of [[Snow Golem|snow golems]].
** Doesn't throw [[Splash Potion|splash potions]].
* [[File:Snow Golem.png|32px]] Spooky Golem
** Developed by Jack S.
** Created to celebrate Halloween, the creator's favorite holiday.
** "Somehow still moving around from beyond the grave."
* [[File:Minecon Wraith.png|32px]] Wraith
** Developed by Jordan J.
** A resurrected [[evoker]], created from it using the totem of undying.
** Intended to be stronger than regular evokers.

== Quotes ==
{{Quote|Create your own mob in less than 30 seconds?! You better believe it! The Minecraft Entity Wizard allows for a simple way to quickly make an entity and get it to the game, thus removing the tedious work of gathering all the files needed for its resource and behavior pack. Build from scratch, start with inspiration and choose the closest likeness in appearance and behavior, or create a wacky mash-up â€“ such as a dolphin with the terrifying behavior of a phantom, or maybe a warden with the calm attitude of a snow golem. Everything is possible!|Microsoft Learn}}
